name: FoodFusion
description: Food Shop is an innovative online marketplace built with React, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and Firebase. It provides a delightful shopping experience, offering fresh and high-quality food items with easy navigation. Featuring secure authentication, seamless transactions, and real-time updates, Food Shop ensures fast delivery and customer satisfaction in every order.
sortDetails: Food Shop is an e-commerce platform built with React, Node.js, MongoDB, and Firebase, offering fresh food.

name: Sports Shop
description: Sport Shop is a dynamic e-commerce platform built using React, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and Firebase. It offers a seamless shopping experience for sports enthusiasts, featuring a wide range of quality products, secure authentication, real-time inventory updates, and fast checkout. Designed for performance and scalability, it ensures user satisfaction.
sortDetails: It offers a seamless shopping experience for sports enthusiasts, featuring a wide range of quality products,

name: Clothing Shop
description: Clothing Shop is a stylish and modern e-commerce website built with WordPress using the Woodmart theme and enhanced by Elementor. Offering a wide variety of fashion items, it provides a seamless shopping experience with intuitive navigation, high-quality product images, and easy checkout. The site is optimized for performance and user engagement
sortDetails: Clothing Shop is a stylish and modern e-commerce website built with WordPress using the Woodmart theme and enhanced by Elementor.
